instruction: Could you play the music video that's saved on my desktop for me via vlc?

files.url: https://huggingface.co/datasets/xlangai/ubuntu_osworld_file_cache/resolve/main/vlc/59f21cfb-0120-4326-b255-a5b827b38967/Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Music Video).mp4
files.path: /home/user/Desktop/Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Music Video).mp4

command: import pyautogui; import time; pyautogui.click(960, 540); time.sleep(0.5);

rules.file_name: Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Music Video).mp4
